original_text:
“Should a multitude of words go unanswered,
    and a man full of talk be judged right?
korean_text: 말이 많으니 어찌 대답이 없으랴 말이 많은 사람이 어찌 의롭다 함을 얻겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Should a multitude of words go unanswered,
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 말이 응답 없이 지나가야 하겠으며,

sentences.original_text: and a man full of talk be judged right?
sentences.korean_translation: 말이 많은 사람이 옳다 판단되어야 하는가?
